title: July Madhathil Lyrics Muthirai Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song Title : July Madhathil
Artists : Mohamed Aslam, Rahul Nambiar, Tanvi, Priya
Movie : Muthirai

July Madhathil jannal orathil minnal onrai parthaen
Saalai orathil selai katiya solai onrai parthaen

Kannukul neendhum kutti kutti poove
Nenjukul pookum pattu pattu poove
Kannukul neendhum kutti kutti poove
Nenjukul pookum pattu pattu poove

Alaiaddidum kadal polave ade nenjil kadhal vandhu modhum
Adhikaalayum Andhimaalayum thoduvaanam vanna kolam podum

July Madhathil jannal orathil minnal onrai parthaen
Saalai orathil selai katiya solai onrai parthaen

Thottu thottu sellum kaatri
enna indha pudhu vasanai...........
suthi suthi varum boomiyai
sutri sutri vara yosanai...........

Kaalam adhai niruthi pidithu oru siraiyil podavendum
Kanavu adhai thurathi pidithu iru vizhiyil poda vendum

siru kuzhandaiyai pola maaaruvom
enna vidhimurai yaavum meeruvom
sitrinbam adhai thedalaame thozhaaaaaaa

July Madhathil jannal orathil minnal onrai parthaen
Saalai orathil selai katiya solai onrai parthaen

Enna yidam endru paarthuthaan
Megam mazhai thoorumaa...........
Endha kizhai endru paarthuthaan
Paravaigal vandhu koodumaa.......

Aasai adhu unnaiun manadhil varuvadilai
Aanum oru pennum sera endha thadayum ingu illai .....

Nadhi malayil pirakkum karanam
kadal madiyil sendru serave ..........
sitrinbam adhai thedalaame thozhaaaaaaa

July Madhathil jannal orathil minnal onrai parthaen
Saalai orathil selai katiya solai onrai parthaen

Kannukul neendhum kutti kutti poove
Nenjukul pookum pattu pattu poove
Kannukul neendhum kutti kutti poove
Nenjukul pookum pattu pattu poove

Alaiaddidum kadal polave ade nenjil kadhal vandhu modhum
Adhikaalayum Andhimaalayum thoduvaanam vanna kolam podum

seo.description: Get the complete July Madhathil Lyrics Muthirai Songs Lyrics from Muthirai. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by Yuvan and sung by Mohd. Aslam. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Muthirai, Yuvan, Mohd. Aslam, Priya, Rahul Nambiar, Tanvi Shah, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
